author: cnbc.com
title: ITVantix Acquires ExecuSoft Controls of Peachtree City, Georgia
text:
WARNER ROBINS, Ga., March 2, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- ITVantix, LLC ("ITVantix"), a leading IT, Voice and Security Services provider in middle Georgia, today announced it has acquired ExecuSoft Controls, Inc. ("ExecuSoft"), a leading IT solutions provider in Peachtree City, GA. The acquisition combines the unparalleled service levels and expertise of ExecuSoft with ITVantix's comprehensive managed services portfolio in support of strategic and operational growth.
The demand for managed technology services has grown steadily worldwide. Managed IT services, being one of ITVantix's core businesses, are expected to see especially significant growth in Georgia markets.
ExecuSoft specializes in delivering effective, comprehensive managed IT solutions that leverage current and emerging technologies. Its clients represent small to medium businesses in sectors including manufacturing, finance, healthcare, insurance, government, automotive, retail, food, legal and more.
ITVantix will leverage ExecuSoft's extensive portfolio of experience and resources to boost support for customers throughout the middle and north Georgia markets.
"We're thrilled to bring together the complementary skills and experience of two leading IT Service Providers in Georgia," notes Jerry Bryan, Co-Founder and Shane Sanders, Co-Founder, in a joint statement. "Over the past three years, we have worked diligently to accelerate growth and expand our line of product and service offerings. Bringing ITVantix together with ExecuSoft's impressive talent and deep expertise in providing IT and networking solutions will take us to the next level and deliver extraordinary levels of customer support to businesses throughout Georgia."
A combined management team will lead the merged entity, with ITVantix Co-Founder Jerry Bryan as the Chief Executive Officer and ITVantix Co-Founder Shane Sanders as the Chief Financial Officer. Costas Soulakos, Founder of Execusoft, will continue on as General Manager of Operations in Peachtree City working closely as a strategic advisor to the management team.
"We couldn't be more excited about the opportunities this merger creates. ExecuSoft's customers are like family and as we looked for growth opportunities, it became evident that partnering with ITVantix would provide tangible value to our customers," said Costas Soulakos.
About ITVantix
ITVantix is a leading Information Technology Services Provider in middle Georgia providing best-in-class technology services to small-medium businesses across various sectors including agricultural, retail, automotive, healthcare, religious and non-profit organizations.
A Comprehensive Provider Partnering in Your Success
ITVantix offers Managed IT, Voice and Security products and services to include networking, voice communications, low-voltage infrastructure and commercial & residential security.
For over 35 years, the team at ITVantix has been perfecting IT consulting services, voice communication systems and technology solutions to meet the changing needs of small and midsize businesses. Our diverse practice areas, strategic partnerships with leading technology vendors such as Canon, Cisco, Dell, HP, NCR and Microsoft, along with highly trained and certified technology consultants, make ITVantix uniquely qualified to provide comprehensive, high-value solutions that deliver real business impact to our customers as we partner in your business' success.
